events.message: I am filing a claim for an accident involving my car that occurred yesterday on the highway. The vehicle sustained significant damage and I require assistance.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the description mentioning a vehicle collision and the damages to the car.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your case to guide you through the claim process and help coordinate the repair work for your car.
Your claim for the auto accident has been acknowledged by our team. We understand the inconvenience caused and are committed to resolving it as soon as possible.
Please provide a police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and your insurance policy details to proceed with the investigation of your auto accident claim.
All requested documents including the police report and vehicle damage photos have been submitted successfully via the online portal for your auto accident claim.
Our investigation team has started reviewing the submitted documents and inspecting the circumstances around the vehicle collision as part of your claim process.
The investigation into your auto accident claim has been completed. Findings indicate coverage applies and repair costs are being assessed now.
A settlement proposal reflecting the estimated repair costs and deductibles has been sent to you for review and approval regarding your car accident claim.
We received your feedback about the proposed settlement and noted your requests for clarification about coverage details and payment timelines.
Your auto accident claim has been approved following review of your feedback and adjustments to the settlement offer have been finalized.
The payment for your approved auto accident claim has been issued and should appear in your bank account within the next two business days.
Your case has been successfully closed after the payment was processed. We hope your vehicle repairs proceed smoothly and you remain safe on the road.
